sn35.130:4.1: * Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā mahākaccāno avantīsu viharati kuraraghare papāte pabbate.
sn35.130:4.2: Atha kho hāliddikāni gahapati yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.130:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho hāliddikāni gahapati āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.130:4.7: Kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati phassanānattaṃ;
sn35.130:4.9: “Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā ‘manāpaṃ itthetan’ti pajānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sukhavedaniyañca.
sn35.130:4.11: Cakkhunā kho paneva rūpaṃ disvā ‘amanāpaṃ itthetan’ti pajānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dukkhavedaniyañca.
sn35.130:4.13: Cakkhunā kho paneva rūpaṃ disvā ‘upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṃ itthetan’ti pajānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyañca.
sn35.130:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, gahapati, bhikkhu sotena saddaṃ sutvā … pe …
sn35.130:5.5: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya ‘manāpaṃ itthetan’ti pajānāti manoviññāṇaṃ sukhavedaniyañca.
sn35.130:5.7: Manasā kho paneva dhammaṃ viññāya ‘amanāpaṃ itthetan’ti pajānāti manoviññāṇaṃ dukkhavedaniyañca.
sn35.130:5.9: Manasā kho paneva dhammaṃ viññāya ‘upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṃ itthetan’ti pajānāti manoviññāṇaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyañca.
sn35.130:5.11: Evaṃ kho, gahapati, dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati phassanānattaṃ;
